text: Group D of the UEFA Euro 2016 qualifying tournament was a group that decided who goes to the UEFA Euro 2016. The group included the teams Germany, Poland, Gibraltar, Republic of Ireland, Scotland and Georgia. == Table == Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 1 Germany 10 7 1 2 24 9 +15 22 2 10 6 3 1 33 10 +23 21 3 Republic of Ireland 10 5 3 2 19 7 +12 18 4 10 4 3 3 22 12 +10 15 5 10 3 0 7 10 16 –6 9 6 10 0 0 10 2 56 –54 0 * Green means that the team will advance to the tournament. * Blue means the team will advance to the tournament, or play in the play-offs. == Statistics == ;13 goals * Robert Lewandowski ;9 goals * Thomas Müller ;7 goals * Steven Fletcher ;6 goals * Arkadiusz Milik ;5 goals * Robbie Keane * Shaun Maloney ;4 goals * Kamil Grosicki ;3 goals * Tornike Okriashvili * Mario Götze * Max Kruse * André Schürrle * Shane Long * Jonathan Walters * Steven Naismith ;2 goals * Jaba Kankava * Valeri Kazaishvili * Mate Vatsadze * İlkay Gündoğan * Grzegorz Krychowiak * Sebastian Mila * James McClean * Aiden McGeady ;1 goal * Nikoloz Gelashvili * Karim Bellarabi * Toni Kroos * Marco Reus * Lee Casciaro * Jake Gosling * Jakub Błaszczykowski * Kamil Glik * Bartosz Kapustka * Krzysztof Mączyński * Sławomir Peszko * Łukasz Szukała * Cyrus Christie * Wes Hoolahan * John O'Shea * Ikechi Anya * Chris Martin * James McArthur * Matt Ritchie == Other websites == * Official page Category:UEFA Euro 2016
title: UEFA Euro 2016 qualifying Group D
